  - Folding state resets unintentionally after switching kernels or reloads.
  - Navigating with the outline fails to reliably unfold/reveal the target cell.
Proposed Solutions:
  - Implement sticky headers based on notebook sections (e.g., markdown H2/H3), not just per cell.
  - Persist folding state across reloads and kernel changes.
  - Ensure outline navigation always reveals and focuses the correct cell/section.
